searchMode.title: Search Mode
searchMode.description: Choose how to search for places

searchTerms.title: Search Terms
searchTerms.description: List of search terms (e.g., 'clínica dermatológica'). Used when searchMode is 'searchTerms'.

location.title: Location
location.description: Location to search in (e.g., 'São Paulo, SP'). Used with searchTerms mode.

domains.title: Domains
domains.description: List of domains to search for (e.g., 'example.com.br'). Used when searchMode is 'domains'.

maxCrawledPlacesPerSearch.title: Max places per search
maxCrawledPlacesPerSearch.description: Maximum number of places to extract per search term/domain

enrichWebsiteData.title: Enrich with website data
enrichWebsiteData.description: Extract additional data from business websites (emails, social media links, etc.)

getGoogleAdsCount.title: Get Google Ads count
getGoogleAdsCount.description: Fetch the number of active Google Ads for each place (requires Google Ads Transparency actor)

googleAdsActorId.title: Google Ads Actor ID
googleAdsActorId.description: Actor ID for Google Ads Transparency scraper (format: username/actor-name). Required if getGoogleAdsCount is enabled.

maxConcurrency.title: Max concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Number of searches to process simultaneously
